20101221020145.000|20101221020146.000|CC1|CURRENTLY MANIFESTING THEMSELVES

20101221020507.000|20101221020510.000|CC1|VICTOR FEHRENBACH, HE IS AN F-15
20101221020510.000|20101221020512.000|CC1|FIGHTER PILOT FACING DISCHARGE  
20101221020512.000|20101221020513.000|CC1|FROM THE AIR FORCE UNDER DON'T

20101221020605.000|20101221020607.000|CC1|OF YOU GUYS.

20101221020626.000|20101221020628.000|CC1|YOU SAW THIS IDIOT ON CABLE NEWS
20101221020628.000|20101221020630.000|CC1|THERE, OVER AND OVER AND OVER   
20101221020630.000|20101221020636.000|CC1|AGAIN, IN THAT SEGMENT SAYING IT

20101221020637.000|20101221020638.000|CC1|IN                              
20101221020638.000|20101221020639.000|CC1|THIS WAY.                       
20101221020639.000|20101221020640.000|CC1|HOW DID YOU FEEL?               
20101221020640.000|20101221020641.000|CC1|>> THE PRESIDENT TOLD ME OVER A 
20101221020641.000|20101221020642.000|CC1|YEAR AGO THAT HE WAS GOING TO   
20101221020642.000|20101221020644.000|CC1|GET THIS DONE, AND WHEN HE SAID 
20101221020644.000|20101221020644.000|CC1|IT, HE BELIEVED IT.             
20101221020644.000|20101221020646.000|CC1|TO BE HONEST WITH YOU, UP UNTIL 
20101221020646.000|20101221020648.000|CC1|LAST THURSDAY OR SO, I DIDN'T   
20101221020648.000|20101221020650.000|CC1|BELIEVE IT.                     
20101221020650.000|20101221020651.000|CC1|I DIDN'T THINK I WOULD SEE THIS 
20101221020651.000|20101221020652.000|CC1|DAY UNTIL I WAS DISCHARGED OR MY
20101221020652.000|20101221020653.000|CC1|RETIREMENT IN SEPTEMBER.        
20101221020653.000|20101221020654.000|CC1|SO IT WASN'T UNTIL THURSDAY THAT
20101221020654.000|20101221020656.000|CC1|I REALLY BELIEVED IT MIGHT      
20101221020656.000|20101221020656.000|CC1|HAPPEN.                         
20101221020656.000|20101221020659.000|CC1|AND THEN BEING THERE IN THE     
20101221020659.000|20101221020700.000|CC1|CHAMBER, IT STILL DIDN'T HIT ME 
20101221020700.000|20101221020701.000|CC1|UNTIL ACTUALLY I HEARD THE VOTER
20101221020701.000|20101221020704.000|CC1|OF MY SENATOR FROM IOWA, SENATOR
20101221020704.000|20101221020705.000|CC1|VOINOVICH, BECAUSE THERE WAS    
20101221020705.000|20101221020707.000|CC1|TALK OF THERE BEING 60, 61      
20101221020707.000|20101221020708.000|CC1|VOTES, AND I HEARD HIS VOICE    
20101221020708.000|20101221020713.000|CC1|GIVE AN AYE, AND I KNEW WE WERE 
20101221020713.000|20101221020716.000|CC1|OVER 62 AND THAT'S WHEN IT      
20101221020716.000|20101221020717.000|CC1|REALLY HIT ME.                  
20101221020717.000|20101221020719.000|CC1|I'VE SPENT DAYS TRYING TO GRASP 
20101221020719.000|20101221020720.000|CC1|THE GRAVITY OF IT ALL.          
20101221020720.000|20101221020721.000|CC1|I DON'T KNOW WHEN THAT'S GOING  
20101221020721.000|20101221020723.000|CC1|TO SINK IN FULLY, BUT IT WAS AN 
20101221020723.000|20101221020725.000|CC1|AMAZING DAY.                    
20101221020725.000|20101221020726.000|CC1|>> I STILL KEEP THINKING THAT   
20101221020726.000|20101221020727.000|CC1|I'M BEING WRONG ON TELEVISION   
20101221020727.000|20101221020729.000|CC1|AGAIN, AND IT HASN'T -- I LIKE  
20101221020729.000|20101221020730.000|CC1|WHEN I'M WRONG ABOUT STUFF LIKE 
20101221020730.000|20101221020731.000|CC1|THIS.                           
20101221020731.000|20101221020732.000|CC1|KATIE, HOW'D YOU FEEL?          
20101221020732.000|20101221020734.000|CC1|>> I WAS COMPLETELY ELATED.     
20101221020734.000|20101221020737.000|CC1|THERE WERE TIMES WHEN I DIDN'T  
20101221020737.000|20101221020739.000|CC1|THINK IT WAS GOING TO GET       
20101221020739.000|20101221020739.000|CC1|REPEALED EITHER, ESPECIALLY     
20101221020739.000|20101221020740.000|CC1|AFTER THE FIRST SENATE VOTE.    
20101221020740.000|20101221020742.000|CC1|I WAS AT A PRETTY ALL-TIME LOW  
20101221020742.000|20101221020743.000|CC1|AFTER THAT.                     
20101221020743.000|20101221020744.000|CC1|SO WHEN I HEARD THE             
20101221020744.000|20101221020745.000|CC1|ANNOUNCEMENT, I WAS COMPLETELY  
20101221020745.000|20101221020746.000|CC1|ELATED.                         
20101221020746.000|20101221020748.000|CC1|AND IT'S NOT JUST A GOOD        
20101221020748.000|20101221020750.000|CC1|DECISION FOR LBGT SERVICE       
20101221020750.000|20101221020751.000|CC1|MEMBERS, IT'S A GOOD DECISION   
20101221020751.000|20101221020753.000|CC1|FOR THE MILITARY AS WELL.       
20101221020753.000|20101221020756.000|CC1|I WAS EXCEEDINGLY PROUD THAT OUR
20101221020756.000|20101221020758.000|CC1|CONGRESS PEOPLE COULD GO WHO WAS
20101221020758.000|20101221020758.000|CC1|RIGHT.                          
20101221020758.000|20101221020802.000|CC1|>> HOW ABOUT YOU, MIKE?         
20101221020802.000|20101221020803.000|CC1|OVERWHELMED.                    
20101221020803.000|20101221020805.000|CC1|THREE'S A CHARM.

20101221020808.000|20101221020810.000|CC1|WE GOT IT RIGHT ON THE THIRD    
20101221020810.000|20101221020811.000|CC1|ATTEMPT.                        
20101221020811.000|20101221020813.000|CC1|I STARTED TO DOUBT IT WAS GOING 
20101221020813.000|20101221020815.000|CC1|TO HAPPEN IN THE LAME DUCK JUST 
20101221020815.000|20101221020815.000|CC1|BECAUSE OF THE CALENDAR.        
20101221020815.000|20101221020817.000|CC1|WE WERE RUNNING OUT OF TIME, BUT
20101221020817.000|20101221020817.000|CC1|WE DID IT.                      
20101221020817.000|20101221020819.000|CC1|>> HOW ABOUT YOU, JOHN?         
20101221020819.000|20101221020821.000|CC1|>> I'M EXCITED FOR THE TENS OF  
20101221020821.000|20101221020822.000|CC1|THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE WHO ARE GAY 
20101221020822.000|20101221020823.000|CC1|AND IN THE SERVICE, THAT THEY NO

20101221020825.000|20101221020826.000|CC1|FEEL LIKE THEY'RE A CRIMINAL,   
20101221020826.000|20101221020827.000|CC1|BECAUSE THEY COULD GET FIRED FOR

20101221020829.000|20101221020833.000|CC1|I MEAN, I SPENT NINE YEARS IN   
20101221020833.000|20101221020834.000|CC1|AND KNEW THE AMOUNT OF PAIN THAT
20101221020834.000|20101221020835.000|CC1|THAT CAUSED.                    
20101221020835.000|20101221020837.000|CC1|BUT SECONDLY, I FELT VERY, VERY 
20101221020837.000|20101221020840.000|CC1|PROUD FOR THOSE 65 SENATORS     
20101221020840.000|20101221020842.000|CC1|THAT, IT'S NOT TOO OFTEN THAT   
20101221020842.000|20101221020843.000|CC1|MEMBERS OF THE SENATE GET TO

20101221020845.000|20101221020847.000|CC1|CHANGES PEOPLE'S LIVES AND

20101221020850.000|20101221020859.000|CC1|[ APPLAUSE ]                    
20101221020859.000|20101221020901.000|CC1|>> ACTUALLY, JONATHAN AND KATIE,

20101221021118.000|20101221021121.000|CC1|>> VICTOR, LET ME ASK YOU, JUST 
20101221021121.000|20101221021122.000|CC1|THINKING ABOUT LEADERSHIP.

20101221021128.000|20101221021130.000|CC1|IT OVER QUIETLY AND QUICKLY AND 
20101221021130.000|20101221021131.000|CC1|YOU JUST WANTED IT DONE WITH.   
20101221021131.000|20101221021133.000|CC1|WHAT MADE YOU CHANGE YOUR MIND  
20101221021133.000|20101221021134.000|CC1|AND DECIDE TO STAND UP AND BE   
20101221021134.000|20101221021135.000|CC1|COUNTED AND FIGHT IT?           
20101221021135.000|20101221021137.000|CC1|>> THERE WERE ACTUALLY A COUPLE 
20101221021137.000|20101221021139.000|CC1|OF DECISION POINTS I HAD TO MAKE

20101221021142.000|20101221021143.000|CC1|>> DECISION POINTS, I THINK     
20101221021143.000|20101221021144.000|CC1|THERE'S 13, SPECIFICALLY.       
20101221021144.000|20101221021146.000|CC1|>> AND YOU'RE RIGHT, INITIALLY, 
20101221021146.000|20101221021148.000|CC1|I JUST -- I DIDN'T WANT ANYONE  
20101221021148.000|20101221021149.000|CC1|TO KNOW.                        
20101221021149.000|20101221021151.000|CC1|I WASN'T OUT TO MY FAMILY OR ANY
20101221021151.000|20101221021151.000|CC1|FRIENDS.                        
20101221021151.000|20101221021153.000|CC1|I HAD JUST A FEW FRIENDS THAT I 
20101221021153.000|20101221021154.000|CC1|COULD RELY AND TALK TO, AND MIKE
20101221021154.000|20101221021155.000|CC1|WAS ONE OF THEM.                
20101221021155.000|20101221021156.000|CC1|THE FIRST PERSON I TOLD WAS MIKE
20101221021156.000|20101221021158.000|CC1|ALMY ABOUT WHAT I WAS GOING     
20101221021158.000|20101221021158.000|CC1|THROUGH.                        
20101221021158.000|20101221021159.000|CC1|AND I JUST WANTED IT TO BE      
20101221021159.000|20101221021200.000|CC1|QUIET.                          
20101221021200.000|20101221021202.000|CC1|I SECURED A JOB, I WAS GOING TO 
20101221021202.000|20101221021203.000|CC1|MOVE ON.                        
20101221021203.000|20101221021205.000|CC1|AND THE FIRST MAJOR DECISION    
20101221021205.000|20101221021207.000|CC1|POINT WAS, I WAS AT THE LOWEST  
20101221021207.000|20101221021207.000|CC1|LOW.                            
20101221021207.000|20101221021210.000|CC1|I MEAN, WHERE I WANTED TO -- I  
20101221021210.000|20101221021212.000|CC1|WANTED TO QUIT A LOT OF THINGS, 
20101221021212.000|20101221021214.000|CC1|INCLUDING LIFE.                 
20101221021214.000|20101221021215.000|CC1|AND SOMEBODY SAID, YOU NEED TO  
20101221021215.000|20101221021217.000|CC1|HEAR THIS STORY ABOUT MAJOR     
20101221021217.000|20101221021219.000|CC1|MARGARET WHIT IN WASHINGTON.    
20101221021219.000|20101221021221.000|CC1|SHE JUST FOUGHT AND WON A CASE, 
20101221021221.000|20101221021222.000|CC1|AND THIS COULD APPLY TO YOU     
20101221021222.000|20101221021223.000|CC1|SOMEHOW, SO READ ABOUT THAT.    
20101221021223.000|20101221021224.000|CC1|AND I DID.                      
20101221021224.000|20101221021225.000|CC1|AND THAT WAS THE FIRST SIGN THAT
20101221021225.000|20101221021228.000|CC1|I HAD OF HOPE THAT SOMEBODY     
20101221021228.000|20101221021231.000|CC1|COULD ACTUALLY FIGHT AND WIN.   
20101221021231.000|20101221021232.000|CC1|IT WAS HER WILL TO FIGHT AND    
20101221021232.000|20101221021233.000|CC1|STICK TO IT THAT WAS THE FIRST  
20101221021233.000|20101221021237.000|CC1|MAJOR DECISION POINT.           
20101221021237.000|20101221021238.000|CC1|I REMEMBER, I CALLED MIKE THAT  
20101221021238.000|20101221021239.000|CC1|DAY AND I SAID, DO YOU THINK    
20101221021239.000|20101221021240.000|CC1|THAT THIS COULD BE POSSIBLE, THE
20101221021240.000|20101221021241.000|CC1|I COULD TELL MY STORY AND IT    
20101221021241.000|20101221021242.000|CC1|WOULD HAVE AN IMPACT AND I COULD
20101221021242.000|20101221021244.000|CC1|FIGHT THIS AND I COULD WIN, DO  
20101221021244.000|20101221021246.000|CC1|YOU THINK THAT'S EVEN POSSIBLE. 
20101221021246.000|20101221021247.000|CC1|AND MIKE AND ALL MY FRIENDS,    
20101221021247.000|20101221021248.000|CC1|THAT'S WHAT WE WANTED TO HEAR   
20101221021248.000|20101221021250.000|CC1|FROM YOU, NOT THAT YOU WERE     
20101221021250.000|20101221021251.000|CC1|GOING TO GIVE UP AND QUIT.      
20101221021251.000|20101221021253.000|CC1|THEY HAD A LOT TO DO WITH THAT. 
20101221021253.000|20101221021254.000|CC1|THERE WAS ANOTHER MAJOR POINT,  
20101221021254.000|20101221021255.000|CC1|THIS WAS A YEAR LATER, I'D BEEN 
20101221021255.000|20101221021257.000|CC1|ON THE SHOW AND TALKED, AND IT  
20101221021257.000|20101221021259.000|CC1|WAS COMING UP TO A DECISION     
20101221021259.000|20101221021300.000|CC1|ABOUT THE LEGAL BATTLE, WHETHER 
20101221021300.000|20101221021302.000|CC1|WE WERE GOING TO TAKE THAT ON.  
20101221021302.000|20101221021303.000|CC1|SO, AGAIN, I ALWAYS KNEW IT WAS 
20101221021303.000|20101221021305.000|CC1|THE RIGHT THING TO DO, AND I    
20101221021305.000|20101221021306.000|CC1|JUST WONDERED IF I HAD THE      
20101221021306.000|20101221021307.000|CC1|COURAGE TO DO IT, AND I WASN'T  
20101221021307.000|20101221021308.000|CC1|SURE ABOUT THAT.                
20101221021308.000|20101221021311.000|CC1|SO I WAS GOING TO MAKE THE      
20101221021311.000|20101221021312.000|CC1|DECISION UP TO LAST THANKSGIVING
20101221021312.000|20101221021315.000|CC1|AND WE WERE TALKING TO SOME LAW 
20101221021315.000|20101221021316.000|CC1|FIRMS ABOUT IT.                 
20101221021316.000|20101221021318.000|CC1|AND ONE OF MY CONCERNS WAS, HOW 
20101221021318.000|20101221021320.000|CC1|WAS THIS GOING TO IMPACT MY     
20101221021320.000|20101221021321.000|CC1|PERSONAL LIFE?

20101221022252.000|20101221022252.000|CC1|CHRISTMAS.                      
20101221022252.000|20101221022256.000|CC1|>> REPUBLICANS ASKED US TO DELAY
20101221022256.000|20101221022256.000|CC1|IT.

20101221022908.000|20101221022912.000|CC1|>>> TONIGHT ON OUR LEADERSHIP IN
20101221022912.000|20101221022913.000|CC1|AMERICA EDITION OF THE          
20101221022913.000|20101221022914.000|CC1|INTERVIEW, THE MAN CALLED DR.   
20101221022914.000|20101221022916.000|CC1|DOOM, BECAUSE HE WAS RIGHT WHEN 
20101221022916.000|20101221022918.000|CC1|ALMOST NO ONE ELSE WAS WHEN HE  
20101221022918.000|20101221022919.000|CC1|PREDICTED THE FINANCIAL CRISIS  
20101221022919.000|20101221022921.000|CC1|AT THE END OF THE BUSH
